title: CLARIFY: Scope of user authentication feature
description:
Is 'Add user authentication' for:
  - CLI login/session management?
  - Web dashboard auth?
  - Improvement to existing Spotify OAuth?
  - Something else?

Current app only has Spotify OAuth, which is working. No user login on CLI yet.

title: Add user authentication to the app
description: Implement user authentication to control app access. Need to clarify scope: CLI auth, web dashboard auth, or both?

comments.author: aaryanrampal
comments.text:
DISCOVERY: The implementation plan (docs/plans/2026-01-16-spotify-dj-implementation.md) does not include user authentication. The app currently has Spotify OAuth auth but no CLI user login. Need to clarify if this is:

1. A new requirement beyond the implementation plan?
2. A misunderstanding (maybe should be 'improve Spotify auth')?
3. Preparation for a future web dashboard?

Blocking decision on scope until clarified.
